text: Klaus Dede (1 June 1935 – 5 May 2018) was a German writer and journalist. He was born in Nordenham, Germany. He wrote several books over local history in northern part of Lower-Saxony (Butjadingen, Oldenburg, Bremerhaven, Stedingen, Jade, Wesermarsch) and a book about Jesus Jesus – schwul?, Die Kirchen, die Christen und die Liebe (translated "Was Jesus gay?"). He lives in Oldenburg. Dede died on 5 May 2018 in Oldenburg at the age of 81.Schriftsteller Klaus Dede gestorben == References == == Other websites == * * www.klausdede.de Official website by Klaus Dede * www.erinnerungsgang.de Official website of Erinnerungsgang Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:German journalists Category:Writers from Lower Saxony
title: Klaus Dede
